name: Social Sustainability
explanation: Social Sustainability relates to the long-term sustainability of the company and its culture. It includes topics such as data-privacy, diversity and overall sustainability from a company perspective

name: Software Sustainability
explanation: Software Sustainability relates to the sustainability of the product/ application. It is not necessarily the case that one option is always more sustainable than others, but in the context of already made software requirements these can give insight to the sustainability of the product.

name: Measurable Metrics
explanation: These are possible standard metrics that can be used to do a relative comparison between solutions.
